text: William Shockley may refer to: * Bill Shockley (1937–1992), American footballer * William Shockley (1910–1989), British-born American physicist and Nobel Prize winner for co-inventing the transistor * William Hillman Shockley, American mining engineer and plant collector, father of William Bradford Shockley * William R. Shockley (1918–1945), Medal of Honor recipient * William Shockley (actor) (born 1963), American born actor best known for his role as Hank Lawson on Dr Quinn, Medicine Woman.
title: William Shockley (disambiguation)
